bio: Lisa helps connect business communications with customer workflows by working closely with the teams that create Vonage integrations with CRMs such as Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics and HubSpot.  Through adding developer solutions for Vonage Apps, she looks forward to unlocking powerful capabilities for people to work and communicate seamlessly within the platforms they use the most. Outside of work, Lisa enjoys singing choral music, playing the mellophone bugle, and spending time with her husband and their corgi.
name: Lisa Venezia
